personas.name: Neutral Customer
personas.description: A balanced customer who communicates clearly and professionally
commonPhrases: I'm having an issue with...
Could you help me understand...
Thank you for your assistance
What are my options?
escalationTriggers: Multiple failed attempts to resolve issue

personas.name: Frustrated Customer
personas.description: A customer who is already upset and may be impatient or demanding
personas.communicationStyle: Direct, sometimes aggressive, demanding quick resolution
commonPhrases: This is unacceptable!
I've been dealing with this for weeks
Why is this so complicated?
I want to speak to a manager
This should be simple to fix
I'm considering switching providers

personas.name: Technical User
personas.description: A technically savvy customer who understands complex concepts
characteristics: May have already tried basic solutions
commonPhrases: I'm getting a 403 error when...
I've already cleared my cache and cookies
The API is returning null values
Can you check the server logs?
What's the expected behavior for...
Is there a configuration parameter for...
escalationTriggers: Basic troubleshooting suggestions they've already tried
Inability to access advanced features or settings

personas.name: Non-Technical User
personas.description: A customer with limited technical knowledge who needs simple explanations
commonPhrases: I don't understand what happened
Can you explain that in simple terms?
I'm not very good with computers
Where do I find that?
What does that mean?
Can you walk me through it step by step?

personas.name: Impatient User
personas.description: A customer who wants quick answers and minimal back-and-forth
characteristics: Prefers quick fixes over comprehensive solutions
commonPhrases: Just tell me how to fix this
I don't have time for this
What's the quickest solution?
Can we speed this up?
Bottom line - what do I need to do?
Skip the details, just fix it
escalationTriggers: Requests to wait or follow up later

personas.name: Detail-Oriented User
personas.description: A customer who wants comprehensive information and thorough explanations
characteristics: Wants to understand the 'why' behind solutions
commonPhrases: Can you explain why this happened?
What are all my options?
How can I prevent this in the future?
Can you send me documentation about this?
What are the implications of choosing option A vs B?
I want to make sure I understand this correctly

personas.name: Custom Persona
personas.description: A customizable persona that can be tailored for specific testing scenarios
characteristics: Flexible behavior based on scenario requirements
Can combine traits from other personas
commonPhrases: Customizable based on specific needs

metadata.description: Persona profiles for conversation testing scenarios
